text: Kya Hua Tera Vaada is an Indian television soap opera, it was aired on from Sony TV, The series will be created by Balaji Telefilms. And produced by Ekta Kapoor and Shobha Kapoor The series is starred by Mona Singh. ==References== Category:2010s Indian television series Category:2012 television series debuts Category:2013 television series endings Category:2012 establishments in India Category:2013 disestablishments in India
title: Kya Hua Tera Vaada
